title: Episode 2: Dungeons & Spiders
description: You're throwing a party tonight but there are spiders everywhere! Luckily, you have your trusty Spider-Ex spray can with you to save the day. Navigate through the corridor and tap the screen to kill the spiders.

title: Episode 1: Money Riot
description: This game is an adaptation of the iterated prisoners dilemma. You play against your former partner-in-crime Marv to get out of prison and become a millionaire.
